Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to requiring certain residential facilities provide free internet access to certain residents
Summary: Requires voluntary and state-run residential facilities provide free internet access to residents who are developmentally disabled.
LawCode: Add ยง16.39, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring certain residential facilities provide free internet access to certain residents
